dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-jsx: An inheritable ESLint configuration for JSX- and React-like components.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-solid: An ESLint plugin that covers Solid components.

devDependencies.@types/eslint: A set of type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependencies.vite-plugin-dts: A Vite plugin that generates TypeScript declaration files.

peerDependencies.eslint: A static program analysis tool that uncovers code issues.
